    • Method Detail

      • checkTransforms

        public static void checkTransforms(Map<String,String> transforms)
        Verify the names of the transforms in the map.
        Parameters:
        transforms - map of attribute transforms. Valid values: toLowerCase, toUpperCase
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - in case of invalid transform name

      • replace

        public static String replace(String filter,
                             String name,
                             String value,
                             Map<String,String> transforms)
        Expand attributes in filter string.
        Parameters:
        filter - input string
        name - attribute name
        value - value to replace
        transforms - map of transformations to be potentially applied on the value
        Returns:
        new value of the string

      • expandUserFilter

        public static String expandUserFilter(User user,
                                      String filter)
        Replace attribute names with values in filter string.
        Parameters:
        user - User object
        filter - filter string
        Returns:
        filter with the values replaced
        See Also:
        expandUserFilter(User, String, Map)

      • expandUserFilter

        public static String expandUserFilter(User user,
                                      String filter,
                                      Map<String,String> transforms)
        Expand User object attribute values into the filter. Special values are:
        • %username% - to be replaced with username value from the User object
        • %guid% - to be replaced with guid value from the User object
        Parameters:
        user - User object from the request (created by UserPlugin)
        filter - filter
        transforms - map of transforms
        Returns:
        replaced result
